document_data.name: Tod Uphill
document_data.mainbody: '''Tod Uphill''' was an adventuring [[thief]] who fell into the [[Waterdeep]] sewers ''circa'' [[1358 DR]]. He had short brown hair and a black eyepatch covering his right eye.
document_data.Personality: The thief was somewhat paranoid. He claimed to have been charged with completing many important quests, and accused a group of laughing at him after telling them his story of ending up in the sewers.
document_data.History: Tod Uphill was, apparently, a serious adventurer and was given important tasks, but managed to fall into a sewage drain. The [[halfling]] may have been resurrected by a group that set out to slay [[Xanathar]]. If so, he asked if the group needed a skilled rogue in the party.
